headline: Super Micro Computer Sank Amid Financial Reporting Troubles in Recent Months. Could the Stock Become the Biggest Recovery Story of 2025?
summary: The share price followed, climbing 188% in the first half of the year.  The shares tumbled 22% in the four trading sessions after the short report alleging accounting problems at Supermicro.  Since that news several weeks ago, though, Supermicro seems to have turned things around.

headline: Super Micro Computer: Continues Surging Higher (Technical Analysis)
summary: Financial writer upgrades Super Micro Computer (SMCI) to strong buy citing stability, valuation, and NASDAQ extension. Explore more here.
